name: Death Replay

issues.info: Any bugs with Death Replay should be reported here.

description: Shows all of your level deaths while playing it

show-ghost.name: Show Ghost
show-ghost.description: Show ghost from a previous attempt while playing any level.

show-particles.name: Show Particles
show-particles.description: Shows death particles. Functionality of this feature is currently limited on Android and Windows.

record-practice.name: Record in Practice Mode
record-practice.description: Record all death positions in Practice Mode.

record-globed-players.name: Record Players in Globed
record-globed-players.description: Allows Death Replay to record deaths caused by online players.

debug-mode.name: Debug Mode
debug-mode.description: Spams terminal with debug output when this feature is enabled. Useful for debugging bugs and crashes.

ghost-offset.name: Ghost Offset
ghost-offset.description: Offsets ghost's position by approximately X seconds.

death-marker-opacity.name: Marker Opacity
death-marker-opacity.description: Sets death marker opacity by X. 1 is fully visible and 0 is fully invisible.

show-markers-after-death.name: Show Markers After Death
show-markers-after-death.description: Makes markers invisible until offline player dies.

show-farthest-ghost.name: Show Farthest Ghost
show-farthest-ghost.description: Shows ghost which went furthest from the start in platformer levels or had highest percentage in classic levels.
